sentences.sContent: Under federal law, it is illegal to discriminate against minorities and women.
sentences.sCn: 联邦法律规定，歧视少数民族和妇女是违法的。

sentences.sContent: He is incapable of discriminating between a good idea and a terrible one.
sentences.sCn: 他没能力在一个好主意和一个坏主意之间进行区分。

remMethod.val: dis(离开)+crimin(分开)+ate(使)→使分开→区别， 辨别

words.tran: 有辨识力的；差别对待的
识别的；有差别的；有识别力的
区别的，歧视的；有识别力的

trans.tranCn: 有差别地对待,歧视；区别,辨别
trans.tranOther: to treat a person or group differently from another in an unfair way
